sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-app-bar
      color="teal lighten-3"
      dark
      hide-on-scroll
      prominent
      scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-4"
    >
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn color="pink lighten-3" dark @click="dialog = true"> LOGIN </v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: "ListItem",
    data() {
        return {
            search: null,
            dialog: false,
            dialogEdit: false,
            editStatus: false,
            deleteStatus: false,
            deleteIndex: -1,
            editIndex: -1,
            headers: [
                {
                    text: "Nama",
                    align: "start",
                    sortable: true,
                    value: "nama",
                },
                { text: "Calories", value: "calories" },
                { text: "Note", value: "note" },
                { text: "Status", value: "status" },
                { text: "Actions", value: "actions" },
            ],
            todos: [
                {
                    nama: "Fried Rice",
                    calories: "120",
                    note: "Tidak pakai cabe",
                    status: "On Process",
                },
                {
                    nama: "Dessert",
                    calories: "350",
                    note: "Tambah alat makan",
                    status: "Ready",
                },
                {
                    nama: "Ice Cream",
                    calories: "450",
                    note: "Rasa coklat dan stroberi aja",
                    status: "Delivery",
                },
            ],
            formTodo: {
                nama: null,
                calories: null,
                note: null,
                status: null,
            },
            editTodo: {
                nama: null,
                calories: null,
                note: null,
                status: null,
            },
        };
    },
    methods: {
        save() {
            this.todos.push(this.formTodo);
            this.resetForm();
            this.dialog = false;
        },
        // EDIT CODE
        editItem(item) {
            this.editIndex = this.todos.indexOf(item);
            this.formTodo.nama = item.nama;
            this.formTodo.calories = item.calories;
            this.formTodo.note = item.note;
            this.formTodo.status = item.status;

            this.editStatus = true;
        },
        cancelEdit() {
            this.editStatus = false;
        },
        confirmEdit() {
            this.todos[this.editIndex].nama = this.formTodo.nama;
            this.todos[this.editIndex].calories = this.formTodo.calories;
            this.todos[this.editIndex].note = this.formTodo.note;
            this.todos[this.editIndex].status = this.formTodo.status;

            this.editStatus = false;
            this.resetForm();
            this.editIndex = -1;
        },
        // END of EDIT CODE
        cancel() {
            this.resetForm();
            this.dialog = false;
        },
        // DELETE CODE
        deleteItem(item) {
            this.deleteIndex = this.todos.indexOf(item);
            this.deleteStatus = true;
        },
        cancelDelete() {
            this.deleteStatus = false;
        },
        confirmDelete() {
            this.todos.splice(this.deleteIndex, 1);
            this.deleteStatus = false;
        },
        // END of DELETE CODE
        resetForm() {
            this.formTodo = {
                nama: null,
                calories: null,
                note: null,
                status: null,
            };
        },
    },
};
</script>

<style>
.fontheader {
  text-align: centers;
}
</style>
